name: Mercury selenide
desc: Mercury selenide (HgSe) is a chemical compound of mercury and selenium. It is a grey-black crystalline solid semi-metal with a sphalerite structure. The lattice constant is 0.608 nm.
EU classification (DSD) (outdated):
Very toxic (T+)
Dangerous for the environment (N)
Other anions:
Mercury oxide
Mercury sulfide
Mercury telluride
